DOC.brief_title: Ethyl Eicosapentanoic Acid ( Ethyl-EPA ) Treating Major Depression
DOC.detailed_description: Evidence suggest omega-3 fatty acid may help reduce symptom depression . This study determine whether ethyl-EPA , omega-3 fatty acid , use safely effectively treat major depression . Participants randomly assign receive either ethyl EPA-containing pill placebo daily 8 week . Each week , participant ask complete questionnaire use assess severity depression .
